attributes.action: take urgent action to deter criminals from using knives as a weapon of choice before more innocent policemen and civilians are stabbed to death on our streets.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In view of the recent and seemingly never ending, spate of killings where knives have been used as the weapon of choice, we feel it is time the law of this land provided a deterrent to those who think it is ok to carry and use knives.   We need a strong government to legislate now to stop knife culture taking over Britain.
